verses.verse: Oh give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord,<WH3068> for He is good;<WH2896> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Let the redeemed<WH1350> of the Lord<WH3068> say<WH559> [so], Whom<WH834> He has redeemed<WH1350> from the hand<WH3027> of the adversary,<WH6862>
And gathered<WH6908> from the lands,<WH776> From the east<WH4217> and from the west,<WH4628> From the north<WH6828> and from the south.<WH3220>
They wandered<WH8582> in the wilderness<WH4057> in a desert<WH3452> region;<WH3452> They did not find<WH4672> a way<WH1870> to an inhabited<WH4186> city.<WH5892>
[They were] hungry<WH7457> and thirsty;<WH6771> Their soul<WH5315> fainted<WH5848> within them.
Then they cried<WH6817> out to the Lord<WH3068> in their trouble;<WH9496> He delivered<WH5337> them out of their distresses.<WH4691>
He led<WH1869> them also by a straight<WH3477> way,<WH1870> To go<WH1980> to an inhabited<WH4186> city.<WH5892>
Let them give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068> for His lovingkindness,<WH2617> And for His wonders<WH6381> to the sons<WH1121> of men!<WH120>
For He has satisfied<WH7646> the thirsty<WH8264> soul,<WH5315> And the hungry<WH7457> soul<WH5315> He has filled<WH4390> with what<WH9185> is good.<WH9185>
There were those who dwelt<WH3427> in darkness<WH2822> and in the shadow<WH6757> of death,<WH6757> Prisoners<WH615> in misery<WH6040> and chains,<WH1270>
Because<WH3588> they had rebelled<WH4784> against the words<WH561> of God,<WH410> And spurned<WH5006> the counsel<WH6098> of the Most<WH9411> High.<WH9411>
Therefore He humbled<WH3665> their heart<WH3820> with labor;<WH5999> They stumbled<WH3782> and there<WH369> was none<WH369> to help.<WH5826>
Then they cried<WH2199> out to the Lord<WH3068> in their trouble;<WH9496> He saved<WH3467> them out of their distresses.<WH4691>
He brought<WH3318> them out of darkness<WH2822> and the shadow<WH6757> of death,<WH6757> And broke<WH5423> their bands<WH4147> apart.<WH5423>
Let them give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068> for His lovingkindness,<WH2617> And for His wonders<WH6381> to the sons<WH1121> of men!<WH120>
For He has shattered<WH7665> gates<WH1817> of bronze,<WH5178> And cut<WH1438> bars<WH1280> of iron<WH1270> asunder.<WH1438>
Fools,<WH191> because<WH4480> of their rebellious<WH6588> way,<WH1870> And because<WH4480> of their iniquities,<WH5771> were afflicted.<WH6031>
Their soul<WH5315> abhorred<WH8581> all<WH3605> kinds of food;<WH400> And they drew<WH5060> near<WH5060> to the gates<WH8179> of death.<WH4194>
Then they cried<WH2199> out to the Lord<WH3068> in their trouble;<WH9496> He saved<WH3467> them out of their distresses.<WH4691>
He sent<WH7971> His word<WH1697> and healed<WH7495> them, And delivered<WH4422> [them] from their destructions.<WH7825>
Let them give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068> for His lovingkindness,<WH2617> And for His wonders<WH6381> to the sons<WH1121> of men!<WH120>
Let them also offer<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> of thanksgiving,<WH8426> And tell<WH5608> of His works<WH4639> with joyful<WH7440> singing.<WH7440>
Those who go<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the sea<WH3220> in ships,<WH591> Who do<WH6213> business<WH4399> on great<WH7227> waters;<WH4325>
They have seen<WH7200> the works<WH4639> of the Lord,<WH3068> And His wonders<WH6381> in the deep.<WH4688>
For He spoke<WH559> and raised<WH5975> up a stormy<WH9370> wind,<WH7307> Which lifted<WH7311> up the waves<WH1530> of the sea.
They rose<WH5927> up to the heavens,<WH8064> they went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the depths;<WH8415> Their soul<WH5315> melted<WH4127> away in [their] misery.<WH9567>
They reeled<WH2287> and staggered<WH5128> like a drunken<WH7910> man,<WH7910> And were at their wits' end.<WH1104>
Then they cried<WH6817> to the Lord<WH3068> in their trouble,<WH9496> And He brought<WH3318> them out of their distresses.<WH4691>
He caused<WH6965> the storm<WH9370> to be still,<WH1827> So that the waves<WH1530> of the sea were hushed.<WH2814>
Then they were glad<WH8055> because<WH3588> they were quiet;<WH8367> So He guided<WH5148> them to their desired<WH2656> haven.<WH4231>
Let them give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068> for His lovingkindness,<WH2617> And for His wonders<WH6381> to the sons<WH1121> of men!<WH120>
Let them extol<WH7311> Him also in the congregation<WH6951> of the people,<WH5971> And praise<WH1984> Him at the seat<WH4186> of the elders.<WH2205>
He changes<WH7760> rivers<WH5104> into a wilderness,<WH4057> And springs<WH4161> of water<WH4325> into a thirsty<WH6774> ground;<WH6774>
A fruitful<WH6529> land<WH776> into a salt<WH4420> waste,<WH4420> Because<WH4480> of the wickedness<WH9567> of those who dwell<WH3427> in it.
He changes<WH7760> a wilderness<WH4057> into a pool<WH98> of water,<WH4325> And a dry<WH6723> land<WH776> into springs<WH4161> of water;<WH4325>
And there<WH8033> He makes the hungry<WH7457> to dwell,<WH3427> So that they may establish<WH3559> an inhabited<WH4186> city,<WH5892>
And sow<WH2232> fields,<WH7704> and plant<WH5193> vineyards,<WH3754> And gather<WH6213> a fruitful<WH6529> harvest.<WH8393>
Also He blesses<WH1288> them and they multiply<WH7235> greatly;<WH3966> And He does not let their cattle<WH929> decrease.<WH4591>
When they are diminished<WH4591> and bowed<WH7817> down<WH7817> Through<WH4480> oppression,<WH6115> misery,<WH9567> and sorrow,<WH3015>
He pours<WH8210> contempt<WH937> upon princes,<WH5081> And makes them wander<WH8582> in a pathless<WH3808> <WH1870> waste.<WH8414>
But He sets<WH7682> the needy<WH34> securely<WH7682> on high<WH7682> away from affliction,<WH6040> And makes<WH7760> [his] families<WH4940> like a flock.<WH6629>
The upright<WH3477> see<WH7200> it, and are glad;<WH8055> But all<WH3605> unrighteousness<WH9390> shuts<WH7092> its mouth.<WH6310>
Who<WH4310> is wise<WH2450>? Let him give<WH8104> heed<WH8104> to these<WH428> things;<WH428> And consider<WH995> the lovingkindnesses<WH2617> of the Lord.<WH3068>
